name: Lone Space
description:
A simpe arcade-style game, made for the 84th itch.io Weekly Game Jam. You just drive a ship through an asteroid field. Avoid asteroids, beacuse you've got a limited number of lives. Don't go off the screen or you'll die. There isn't any score or lives counter intentionally. After you press run wait a little bit for the game to load.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - control the ship
M - Mute/Unmute Audio
Esc/P - Pause/Unpause
F10 - Toggle Fullscreen
